wikitext.*:
[[File:Edith Bratt 1 February 1913.jpg|thumb]]

On [[1 February]] [[1913]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to [[Edith Tolkien|Edith Bratt]]'''.<ref name=C>{{CG|C}}, p. 37</ref><ref>{{HM|Album}}, p. 35</ref>

*'''Subject:''' The postcard picture depicts the dining hall at [[University of Oxford#Exeter College|Exeter College]], and Tolkien has marked his place at the table with an "X".
*'''Publication:''' A reproduction of the postcard appeared in ''[[The Tolkien Family Album]]''.
